```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

This document will show how to import data. 

## Import the FAS Litters CSV
###Notes about paths: We should use relative paths instead of absolute paths because this makes a project more easily reproducible from any computer, not just the original machine. Notice that I haven't installed the entire janitor package, but I want to be able to use the clean_names function. I can use this style code to pull just this 

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

## Look at the dataset

```{r}
litters_df
head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
view(litters_df)
```
